description: Part 2 of a hands-on workshop approach aimed at novice users. A brief history of relational databases provides participants with a foundation of database knowledge. The second portion of the workshop involves a step by step example of how to put an example data set into third normal form.

title: Brent Friedman: Database Normalization for Everybody, Part 1
